GPUAdapterFeatures.summary:
The features read-only property of the
interface returns a object that describes additional functionality supported by the adapter.

remarks.para: You should note that not all features will be available to WebGPU in all browsers that support it, even if the features are supported by the underlying hardware. This could be due to constraints in the underlying system, browser, or adapter. For example:
If you are hoping to take advantage of a specific additional feature in a WebGPU app, thorough testing is advised.

GPUAdapterFeatures.value: A object instance. This is a setlike object.
